website_summaries.verdict: Bone-crunching distortion or soaring overdrive in a compact pedal. Brings an edgy modern crunch.
pros: Small and easy to situate in any pedal box
Offers two great options in one pedal
Searing lead tones and crunch-filled overdrive
Dedicated level, tone, drive, and mode controls
A workhorse pedal for any kit or collection
cons: Some customers experienced an annoying buzz or hum when in use

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT - but will eat batteries like crazy.  Don't forget the 9v adapter!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it is supposed to. I can go from blues to heavy metal with the turn of a dial. The drawback is that if you run off battery power, it will eat batteries very fast even when unplugged and the unit is turned off. I still can't figure out how that's happening, but it does! I have to take the battery out when I'm done playing or I know I'll need a new one when I practice the next day. Nine volt batteries are NOT cheap if you replace them every day. Yes - I've ordered a 9v adapter. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lewis

customer_reviews.title: for the money, you can't go wrong with this ...
customer_reviews.text: for the money, you can't go wrong with this!! I'm a professional playing every weekend (and have been for almost 20 years). Even my bandmates, with far more experience than me, are impressed by this pedal
customer_reviews.author: LEMONFRESHDAY

customer_reviews.title: Near Perfection For A Distortion Pedal
customer_reviews.text: I've got a new appreciation for Behringer after getting this pedal. Literally no need to pick up the $80 alternative. I love the color, yes the build is plastic but it's not like I'm stomping to kill the thing. And it sounds amazing! Nice and bright (if you make it so) The only reason it's not a perfect 5 stars is because of the hiss. The digital noise. If toy pick up a noise gate like I did, you're golden. But on its own... Theirs is a lot of noise.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Thorn

customer_reviews.title: I bought this pedal because I like to change from clean to distorted alot while playing ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pedal because I like to change from clean to distorted alot while playing guitar. I also bought it for bass because my bass amp doesn't have gain. This pedal gives some crazy tones. It didn't take a while before I found a perfect sound. It gives out a gain sound that you can still recognize every note you play. This made my amp sound 50 times better. Makes it super easy to change from clean to distorted sounds fast.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Block

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap. Great tone
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap. Great tone. Forget that it's plastic for a second because, my opinion, the plastic is not a factor. You're looking for an inexpensive pedal with tone right? well this is it. If you're touring and have the money to buy a top of the line pedal, well knock yourself out champ. go for it, woooooo!!!. But this is perfect for the guitarists that just like messing around and may be playing around with friends in a garage.
customer_reviews.author: jason stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good breakup in the distortion
customer_reviews.text: Good breakup in the distortion. Overdrive is strong. Looks good and easy to find your sweet spot. It isn't cased in metal but still sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D. Tank

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great pedal. When you’re a beginner there’s money going everywhere it seems. Highly recommend it. Not sure the plastic casing would hold up to well on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B McCarroll

customer_reviews.title: I really like it and it has a perfect sound
customer_reviews.text: As a distortion/overdrive pedal it's not too noisy; I really like it and it has a perfect sound. You don't need a Boss or Ibanez pedal if you have this one.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: So much for little money
customer_reviews.text: This unit did so much more than I thought it would for the price. Great tone.
customer_reviews.author: Goodwrench3

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: First did not work and replacement did not work either.
customer_reviews.author: JasonSolves

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Looks well built. But it should come with an adapter...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The overdrive side works great but turning it over to the distortion it starts ...
customer_reviews.text: The overdrive side works great but turning it over to the distortion it starts to sound muffled but it could just be the line six amp i have, im not a big fan of it either but but it sounded great through a PA system with my Gibson SG
customer_reviews.author: jwill

customer_reviews.title: works fine for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pedal out of curiousity. Friend has the boss a/b'ed the two they are 95% identical. The boss new is 60 bucks the behringer 24. I have a behringer ultra flanger I have had since 2007 also have a plastic arion delay I've had since the early 90's. So this pedal was a no brainer use it for reggae leads mainly but would work fine for other genres but metal or country. Would work though for classic metal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install into Behringer Pedal Board
customer_reviews.text: This pedal works well for me. Haven't had any issues with it so far. Easy to install into Behringer Pedal Board. I use this pedal along with 6 other Behringer pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: A Price-Performance Plus
customer_reviews.text: A functional masterpiece for the price. OK, I've used some OD and Distortion pedals that have some additional features, but were also much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Fun cheap pedal
customer_reviews.text: Fun cheap pedal. Wish I had bought it sooner. No battery. Fills in the sound of my fender hot rod deluxe Amp.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Duracel 9V Battery lasted only a few days even if I didn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Y. J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent distortion, not too heavy but enough for a solid sound that I'm looking for.

customer_reviews.title: very nice as it offers both overdrive and distortion
customer_reviews.text: out of the 4 pedals I purchased, this one is by far my favorite

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners durable and reliable only needs a power source which is sold separately.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product my friend was very happy to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice distortion pedal!
customer_reviews.text: The overdrive is more fuzzy sounding than I like! But it's really great at distortion! Overall, I would still recommend this pedal!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another Great guitar pedal by Behringer, it's well worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to my pedals!
customer_reviews.text: First pedal that I bought for Behringer and It does sounds pretty good.

customer_reviews.text: Great sound, lots of flexibility, and easy to use. Gave me exactly what I wanted.

customer_reviews.text: Good for adding a bit of crunch. I'm still messing with the settings though. For the price you really can't loose.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son who plays the electric guitar. He loves it. Good quality.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: I love it for the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I love it for the $$$$. It does both OD and distortion. You control the mix of OD/Distortion. It can go from subtle OD to heavy distortion, It does the job for the money

customer_reviews.text: The pedal was exactly what I looking for and gives a perfect overdrive tone while still being able to add some decent distortion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: It is a cheaply made product! There is not a lot of distortion when pedal is engaged!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broken when I received it, immediately returned and bought something else

customer_reviews.title: Behringer
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. Pretty solid. Expected nothing less from a behringer
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying a more expensive pedal
customer_reviews.text: Feedback is an issue at higher volumes. Mine decided to stop working before a show.
customer_reviews.author: Dan's boi

customer_reviews.title: Good pedal, somewhat fragile feel
customer_reviews.text: This pedal is great for beginners looking to expand their sound. The dual overdrive/distortion options were the main draw for me, and they deliver just as you'd expect. The build quality of the pedal itself is a bit flimsy. A friend once told me you really gotta baby these pedals, and I definitely found that to be true through my own assessments. When this pedal breaks, I think I'll upgrade to a nicer one with a stronger build. However, it's good enough now for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron K.

customer_reviews.title: I love it because you have to in one for your ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it because you have to in one for your money I like this . BEHRINGER OVERDRIVE/DISTORTION OD300 so if you don't have one git one !
customer_reviews.author: william Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: What I like: Decent budget pedal that does the job What I don't like: Eats batteries Battery compartment is a pain to get to When the pedal is removed to get to the battery the spring comes out and is a pain to position when reassembling
customer_reviews.author: The Review

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: So I don't pretend to be an expert guitar player or anything, but I just wanted a decent little pedal that I could use for distortion outside of the normal "crank up the gain on your amp" method. It works just fine for that and I get a nice, crunchy, distortion out of it. I just play in my living room (to the chagrin of my neighbors) so I don't stomp the crap out of it, and it seems solid enough for that. Overall, not bad for 30 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: William Gordon

customer_reviews.title: I mean. Its Behringer haha what else can i ...
customer_reviews.text: I mean. Its Behringer haha what else can i say. It gets the job done just a little off for my liking
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: This pedal has brought nothing but a smile on my ...
customer_reviews.text: This pedal has brought nothing but a smile on my face. It has a smooth sound and it just makes playing guitar so much more effective

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a musician friend in India. He loves the product and uses it regularly in his music shows.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good price for the quality, i bought it as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Camaddo

customer_reviews.title: pros and cons of Behringer pedal
customer_reviews.text: Pros -works great just as any pedal -no noise in the signal path - can use any 9v source ( doesn't need its own brand) -sounds very close to the boss pedal. Cons -haven't broken it yet but its made out of plastic. -the overdrive sounds like a hot distortion too tingy - i was trying to kill two birds with one stone and wanted distortion and overdrive but its too fuzzy. Overal good pedal. works flawlessly.if you need a distortion buy this but if you want an overdrive get a separate one because this one takes too much of the distorted sound.
customer_reviews.author: airuiz

customer_reviews.title: so far I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Played it a bit today, so far I am very happy with it. Sounds good. But it does have an annoying hum when on and not playing, I have this in a chain with 2 other pedals, and when I turn this pedal on it produces hum. It doesn't matter if I use a power supply or a battery the hum is there.
customer_reviews.author: Al K Seltzer

customer_reviews.title: I'm gonna keep it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an very good effect pedal. The distortion/OD is raw and highly adjustable. It does create about a 50% volume boost through my practice amp, so be aware during home use! I can't comment on the battery as I always use an AC adapter. I'm very pleased with the sounds that I can produce from this unit.
customer_reviews.author: thumhed

customer_reviews.title: Distortion, Yep
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. I thought it might enhance the distortion more if I ran it through another distortion effect via the amp. Not really that great of a difference. Good back up now in case I ever get just an amp without effects.
customer_reviews.author: D.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great overdrive pedal
customer_reviews.text: The overdrive sound is great with this pedal. I was initially concerned about it being made of plastic but the build is solid. At this price you can't go wrong.

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough about this product sounds fantastic adjustable from slight over drive to full distortion and ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this product sounds fantastic adjustable from slight over drive to full distortion and at a killer price

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again yo
customer_reviews.text: Really tough sound. Made out of plastic but it's both overdrive and distortion and everything in between.

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy about this pedal
customer_reviews.text: I seem to get a nasty hum or buzz when using this pedal. I would recommend buying a boss pedal instead.

customer_reviews.title: ... once I installed the battery it worked in a great way, excellent rough effect I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I thought it didn't work because the adapter was not turning the pedal on but once I installed the battery it worked in a great way, excellent rough effect I wanted

customer_reviews.text: IT DOES ITS JOB. AND IT DONT COST A WHOLE LOT..CHEAP AND EASY TO USE..NOT BAD FOR A 25$ INVESTMENT..

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. I knocked one star off because I wish there was an on/off switch. Seems that it's "on" if cables are plugged in even if the lights are off. Went through the first battery in a day because of this.
customer_reviews.author: asm71

customer_reviews.title: Expected more
customer_reviews.text: I had saw some videos in the web and think that would be a great equipment but, didn't see none of this. Not even get the efect I was expecting. Maybe with another amp it gives his best.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Silva

customer_reviews.title: Heres the catch....(Wisdom Not Included)
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those quick buy mistakes that you only look at the price and first review before buying. For $25, you get exactly what you paid for. A useless block of metal that barely distorts. The best thing about this purchase was the lesson learned.. READ BEFORE YOU BUY It requires two music instrument cords, for the amp and another for guitar (not included). It does not come with a power supply adapter. It can use 9V batteries but will not get enough juice unless plugged in. (batteries not included)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good Pedal
customer_reviews.text: Good pedal, solid conatruction. A must for any starters. Sound quality could be improved. Offers a great range of sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted The pedal was nice, but broke after about 30 minuets of play time.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Behringer OD300 2-Mode Overdrive/Distortion Effects Pedal
customer_reviews.text: Behringer pedals are not a STOMP BOXES. They are affordable pedal switches with a durable PLASTIC enclosuer. Great to play around with untill you decide to but a higher end product. Personally, I love Behringer products!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Speed 5000

customer_reviews.title: Plugged it in and it does not turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Received this item and I could not wait to use it. I guess the price was too good to be true. I plugged it in and it did not turn on. I have a Les Paul guitar and a Line 6 amplifier. I tried different wires, thinking that maybe my wires were broken. But the pedal didn't turn on no matter what I tried. I returned it back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kapoor

customer_reviews.title: bad item
customer_reviews.text: I seem to get a nasty hum or buzz when using this pedal.I would recommend buying a boss pedal instead.This one don't work without batteries
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can make your Guitar sing and also make It cry
customer_reviews.author: JOHN WISNIEWSKI

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Nice distortion really....not even close to a pedal like the OCD but very impressive for the price. Has a nice grind across the spectrum of the OD/DIst. Not terribly touch sensitive but more than enough pedal for a beginner. the only problem is the plastic casing. Tone knob doesn't appear to do much....gain isn't a lot better. better than most solid state distortions included in amplifiers of the 'practice' amp variety. As an example, the distortion is better than what my little Peavey Envoy can provide. Also better than the Danelectro distortion pedal (Fabtone series). recommend as a cheap alternative pedal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Behringer OD300 2-Mode Overdrive/Distortion Instrument Effects Pedal,Purple
product_meta.description:
BEHRINGER OVERDRIVE/DISTORTION OD300
2-Mode Overdrive/Distortion Effects Pedal

 * Take off with overdrive, distortion or a combination of both effects in one powerful pedal
 * This BEHRINGER product has been designed to compete head to head with leading products on the market
 * Dedicated Level, Tone, Drive and Mode controls for awesome sound shaping
 * Blue status LED for effect on/off and battery check
 * Runs on 9 V battery or the BEHRINGER PSU-SB DC power supply (not included)
 * First-class electronic On/Off switch for highest signal integrity in bypass mode
 * High-quality components and exceptionally rugged construction ensure long life
 * Conceived and designed by BEHRINGER Germany

Some tunes call for an edgy modern-crunch; others call for the classic sound of hot and bothered tubes. Some need a little of both. The BEHRINGER Overdrive/Distortion OD300 has all your bases covered. 

TRUCKLOADS OF TONE
With its dedicated OVERDRIVE/DISTORTION blend dial, you can turn all the way to the left for pure overdrive, or all the way to the right for straight-ahead distortion. In between, you get an infinite amount of options for creating the perfect overdrive/distortion cocktail. And with the dedicated TONE, LEVEL and DRIVE dials, everything you need to create a signature sound is at your fingertips.

EASE OF USE
The LED tells you when this pedal is working its magic, and the top-quality on/off switch maintains excellent signal integrity in bypass mode. You can power the OD300 with either a 9 V battery, or the optional PSU-SB DC power supply (not included).

VALUE
Why settle for just overdrive or distortion when you can have both? Set your tone on fire with distortion, overdrive, or a potent blend of both with the BEHRINGER Overdrive/Distortion OD300.

Designed for use with: Guitar/Bass/Keyboards
feature_bullets: Runs on 9V battery or the BEHRINGER PSU-SB DC power supply (not included, best with Polaroid 9V Batteries)
Take off with overdrive, distortion or a combination of both effects in one powerful pedal
This BEHRINGER product has been designed to compete head to head with leading products on the market
Dedicated Level, Tone, Drive and Mode controls for awesome sound shaping
Status LED for effect on/off and battery check
